vote.title: Authorize a construction contract for the installation of water, wastewater, and storm sewer mains at 23 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Ark Contracting Services, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of five - Not to exceed $13,034,855.00 - Financing: Water (Drinking Water) - 2019 TWDB Funds ($8,078,510.91), Wastewater (Clean Water) - 2019 TWDB Funds ($4,565,902.09), and Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($390,442.00)
